registration.label: Welcome to Via Regina Slow Tourism! Please insert the following information:

classes.select: Select the classification of your point
classes.name: Name

rating.question: How do you rate this point?

messages.geolocation-error: Can not get your current location!
messages.registration-success: Thank you! Now you can start to contribute!
messages.marker-popup:
Not your current location?
Drag the marker to correct!
messages.contribution-success: Thank you very much for the contribution!
messages.allemomap-nointernet: The map displaying all people's contributions can not be shown due to no Internet Connection!
messages.registration-noInternet: Registration fails due to no Internet connection!
messages.warning-location: Note: this may not be your current location!
messages.gps-error: GPS error! Please drag the marker to set your current location!
messages.contribution-success-noInternet: Thank you for the contribution. Note that you are currently in offline mode, please re-open the app once you have Internet connection to share your contributions.
messages.photo-unavailable: Taking photo is available only on Android and iOS apps, and not from browsers.
messages.bing-noInternet: Bing Aerial cannot be displayed due to no Internet connection!
messages.osm-noInternet: OpenStreetMap cannot be displayed due to no Internet connection!
messages.storage-error: This browser does not support local storage.

about: The Paths of Regina is an INTERREG project between Italy and Switzerland. Via Regina Slow Tourism (App and WebGIS) is a project of Politecnico di Milano, developed as an extension of the previous project and funded by: Politecnico di Milano, Lombardy Region, Unioncamere Lombardia and Sviluppo Como.

stat.contr-all-single: contribution within 5km of your current location.
stat.contr-all-plural: contributions within 5km of your current location.
stat.nopoint-all: No body has added an emotional rating within 5km of your current location.
stat.nopoint-my: You have not had any contribution yet!
